name: KeepyPup!
description:
Bounce the ball as many times as you can off the dogs head while avoiding the snake each time it makes a pass.

Use the arrow keys to move left and right. Hit space to jump.

This ball bouncing game only partially employs unity's built-in physics system. The ball's y-velocity is moderated by the physics engine, but the deflections are separately calculated. This gives the player more predictable control of the exit angle of the ball off the dog's head.
